Abstract: Jack Anderson reviews performance by Forces of Nature, company trained in various forms of African and modern dance (S)
Snippet: Jack Anderson reviews performance by Forces of Nature, company trained in various forms of African and modern dance (S)
LeadParagraph: Forces of Nature, a company trained in various forms of African and modern dance, offered a ''Kwanzaa Regeneration Night Celebration 99'' on Tuesday night at Aaron Davis Hall.

Headline.Main: The Traditions of Africa, Mixed With the Modern
Headline.PrintHeadline: DANCE REVIEW; The Traditions of Africa, Mixed With the Modern
